name: Space Room
description:
A mysterious ever-changing room, conveniently called Space Room, has been found in a galaxy not so far away. It's time for you and your crew to see what's the mystery behind it.

 INSTRUCTIONS

  • Hold Space/Z/Up to move your ship upwards
  • Hold Shift/X/Left/Right to boost your ship
  • Sections of the Space Room will change randomly, a bar will appear on the bottom of the screen to indicate when this will happen.
  • Being in one of these sections while it's being changed means GAME OVER
  • You will be awarded points depending on how close you're to these changing rooms, and how long do you survive in the Space Room
